Las_Vegas.Miracle Mile Shops:
Miracle Mile Shops (formerly Desert Passage) is a 475,000 square foot (44,129 m²), 1.2-mile (1.9 km) long, enclosed shopping mall on the Las Vegas Strip in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is home to more than 170 stores, 15 restaurants and live entertainment venues.
Synonymous with retail districts throughout the country, the name connotes a shopping environment and also alludes to the "Miracle Mile" district, as the casino renovates its image to a Los Angeles themed resort.
